review_blob: 22 oz. bottle from Bevmo, only $2.79. I guess that should have been my warning. This beer is not an IPA, or at least it doesnt taste like one. A sweet malty taste, kind of watered down and metallic. It looks kind of watery when poured into a glass as well. Aroma is almost nonexistent. I did drink this after a Stone IPA and Lagunitas Hop Stoopid Ale. It may have fallen so flat because of better beer drank before it. Overall I would say skip this beer.
Orange, copper color. Thick head, lacing. Very heavy citrus and pineapple aroma and taste. Medium to heavy mouthfeel. Smooth beer, great taste.
beer_name: Avery The Maharaja Imperial India Pale Ale
